feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack BHS0807B03C/BHS0807B03B/BHS0807A04A/BHS0807A03C/BHS0807A03B maintenance notification.
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 3, 06:00 - 11:00 UTC

Oct 29, 05:32 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

Start time : 03/12/2025 06:00 UTC
End time : 03/12/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience service interruption on racks BHS0807B03C,BHS0807B03B,BHS0807A04A,BHS0807A03C and BHS0807A03B during this maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipments on the specified racks.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Dedicated Servers] - Debian 13/Proxmox 9 installation changes for UEFI boot servers
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 12, 10:00 - 13:00 UTC

Oct 8, 18:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a change is scheduled on the installation process for Debian 13 and Proxmox VE 9 installation on UEFI Dedicated servers.

Start time : 12/11/2025 10:00 UTC
End time : 12/11/2025 13:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Starting on 12/11/2025, all new Debian 13 and Proxmox 9 installations will feature an EFI System Partition (ESP) over RAID1 instead of several ESPs. Legacy boot servers are not affected. Please refer to https://community.ovhcloud.com/community/en/upcoming-change-efi-system-partition-over-raid1-for-linux-installations?id=community_question&sys_id=8602b59034ac7290f078f43c21c5a60d for additional information.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E102G02 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 12, 08:00 - 11:30 UTC

Oct 23, 21:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on rack E102G02.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 12/11/2025 08:00 UTC
End time: 12/11/2025 11:30 UTC
Service impact: During the operation, servers in rack E102G02 will be temporarily unavailable.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate servers in rack E102G02 to racks ERI0102C01B and ERI0102C01C.

Thank you for your understanding.
